programme.title: Tayo The Little Bus
programme.desc: As Lani learns that having good friends is one thing that you can be thankful for, she decides to prepare gifts for her bus friends Tayo, Rogi, and Gani. What presents will she give to them?

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Hero comes across an egg in the garden. To Leo's surprise, a baby Komodo dragon hatches from the egg instead of a baby bird. The Junior Rangers decide to bring the Komodo dragon back to the island it comes from. Leo, Katie, Hero and a sun bear cub set off for the rainforest to find the cub's mother. Alas, they end up trapped in an overgrowth of stinky Rafflesia flowers! Can the Junior Rangers, Hero and sun bear cub overcome the overpowering odour of the Rafflesias and escape?

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett delivers a Pasta Making Machine to a boy in Pisa, Italy. The machine is to help him win a contest for the biggest noodle in town. But when Golden Boy, disguised as a contestant, starts a tomato throwing incident, the Leaning Tower of Pisa is knocked straight. Jett and Jett Pet have to think quick to get the tower back to its proper angle!

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: The series follows the Nekton family, a family of adventurous underwater explorers who live aboard a state-of-the-art submarine, the Aronnax, and explore unknown areas of the Earth's oceans to unravel the mysteries of the depths.

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: When a seam comes undone on Bearbarian's back, it iches terribly. With nothing and no one to help, the teddy bear decides to wake Zoe's three plush cats... the Scratch Pack is back!

programme.title: My Buddy Bonemasher
programme.desc: Iz turns to his genius best friend Sanjay, to help him work out why he suddenly has an imaginary friend. With the stresses of exams, bullies, girls, his mum no wonder he's seeing things. When Bonmasher helps Iz stand up to his bullies, they think that's all he was around for. Or was he?

programme.title: Rise Of The Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.sub-title: Cloak and Swaggart - Jupiter Jim Ahoy!
programme.desc: Four mutant turtle brothers go on adventures where they end up tapping into mystic ninja powers.

programme.title: Beyblade Burst
programme.desc: It's Valt's turn to rise up to the occasion in a clash of epic proportions. When the going gets tough, he finds inspiration in the most unlikely of places. But will it be enough to pull off the unthinkable?

programme.title: Masterchef Junior USA
programme.desc: MasterChef Junior is an American cooking competition involving children from the ages of 8 to 13. The sixth season returns with chefs Gordon Ramsay and Christina Tosi acting as the judges, along Joe Bastianich as the third judge.

programme.title: Survivor 42
programme.desc: Jeff Probst returns to Fiji to host the latest season of Survivor with an all-new group of contestants.

programme.desc: Famous Foodies tells you about what & where the celebrities eat, from healthy lifestyles to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films & Stars brings you the latest new movie releases and the biggest movie stars. Every week a perfect lineup of the hottest events from the big screen including Hollywood releases, interviews with actors and filmmakers, red carpet reports and everything else that's going on in Hollywood.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago S9 - Hunted
programme.desc: While Lloyd and Nya resist Emperor Garmadon's oppressive hold on Ninjago City, Young Wu and the rest of the Ninja are stranded in a barbaric realm where fierce dragons are being hunted down by Iron Baron and his gang of Dragon Hunters. Lloyd must endure in NINJAGO City, the others need to find the fabled Dragon Armor if they ever hope to get back home to stop Emperor Garmadon once and for all.

programme.title: Power Rangers Super Beast Morphers
programme.desc: Following his first major defeat, Evox has possessed Mayor Daniels and plots to finish what he started with the help of Scrozzle and his new generals, Robo-Blaze and Robo-Roxy. However, once they learn of his return, the Beast Morpher Rangers jump back into action to stop him once-and-for all.

programme.title: Angry Birds
programme.desc: The animation series sees our birdy protagonists battling against the long-suffering Piggies in an engaging world full of surprises!

programme.title: Bakugan Battle Planet

programme.title: TOBOT: Galaxy Detectives
programme.desc: Long time ago in the universe, there were 6 Galaxy Weapons that could rule the universe. The cosmic villain Demons is trying to rule the universe with the 6 Galaxy Weapons. One day, the space ship carrying the galaxy weapons is chased by Demons' minion and decides to escape to earth!

programme.title: Syber Surfer Sam
programme.desc: Sam's best friend Vika creates a high-tech ice cream machine, along with a social-media account. Her likes' are racking up, and she soon becomes obsessed. When the ice-cream machine breaks and floods the school, Sam travels into Cyberspace to fix it - but learns that an equally like-obsessed Pistachio dictator is hooking Vika on likes' for his own nefarious plan. He must be stopped.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Optimus Prime finds his dead home planet, Cybertron, in which he comes to find he was responsible for its destruction. He finds a way to bring Cybertron back to life, but in order to do so, Optimus needs to find an artifact that is on Earth.
